00047 class zimbraActionsUser_common extends zimbraActions{
00056           public function getFolderid($uid,$folderpath){
00057 
00058                     $cachegroup='folders_'.$cmd['uid'];
00059                     $cname='f_'.$cmd['folder'];
00060 
00061                     // getfolderid
00062                     $efolderid=$this->getCache($cachegroup,$cname);
00063                     if($efolderid===false){
00064                               $soap=array('GetFolderRequest','zimbraMail','<folder path="'.$folderpath.'"/>');
00065                               $ret=$this->dousersoap($cmd['uid'],$soap);
00066 
00067                               $efolderid=c($ret['soap:Body']['GetFolderResponse']['folder']['id']);
00068 
00069                               if(!$efolderid || !is_numeric($efolderid)){
00070                                         return false;
00071                               }
00072 
00073                               $this->setCache($cachegroup,$cname,$efolderid);
00074                     }
00075                     return $efolderid;
00076           }
00077

00086           private function doReceiptHeaders($from){
00087                     $ret=array();
00088 
00089                     foreach($from as $f){
00090                               $name=$f['p'].'( '.$f['d'].' )';
00091                               $email=$f['a'];
00092 
00093                               if(strpos($f['t'],'t')){
00094                                         $ret['to'][]=array('name'=>$name,'email'=>$email);
00095                               }
00096 
00097                               if(strpos($f['t'],'f')){
00098                                         $ret['from'][]=array('name'=>$name,'email'=>$email);
00099                               }
00100 
00101                               if(strpos($f['t'],'c')){
00102                                         $ret['cc'][]=array('name'=>$name,'email'=>$email);
00103                               }
00104                     }
00105                     return $ret;
00106           }

00120           function getIdFromExternalId($externID){
00121                     $t=-1;
00122                     try{
00123                               $ret=@unserialize(@file_get_contents($this->path.'oracle_zimbra_id.txt'));
00124                               if(isset($ret[$oracleid]) && $ret[$oracleid]!=''){
00125                                         $t=$ret[$externID];
00126                               }
00127                     }catch(Exception $e){
00128                     }
00129 
00130                     return false;
00131           }
00132 
00141           function setExternalIdMap($externID,$zimbraID){
00142                     try{
00143                               $ret=@unserialize(@file_get_contents($this->path.'oracle_zimbra_id.txt'));
00144                               $ret[$externID]=$zimbraID;
00145 
00146                               file_put_contents($this->path.'oracle_zimbra_id.txt',serialize($ret));
00147 
00148                     }catch(Exception $e){
00149                               errlog("Couldn't save: OracleId: $oraclid => ZimbraId: $zimbraid");
00150                     }
00151 
00152           }

00162           function TimeToStamp($time,$format=0){
00163 
00164                     //ddmmYYYY_hhii
00165                     if($format==0){
00166                               $d=substr($time,0,2);
00167                               $m=substr($time,2,2);
00168                               $y=substr($time,4,4);
00169                               $h=substr($time,9,2);
00170                               $i=substr($time,11,2);
00171                     //20100213T142000
00172                     }else if($format==1){
00173                               $y=substr($time,0,4);
00174                               $m=substr($time,4,2);
00175                               $d=substr($time,6,2);
00176                               $h=substr($time,9,2);
00177                               $i=substr($time,11,2);
00178                     }
00179 
00180                     $t=mktime($h,$i,0,$m,$d,$y);
00181                     echo date('d.m.Y H:i:s',$t);
00182                     return $t;
00183           }
